ai-patthana21.49:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.49:0.3_0: Setting on what is defilement, etc., for the sake of adverting, and so on.
ai-patthana21.49:1.1_0: Not for the sake of livelihood, nor for the sake of livelihood, but not for the sake of fun. It doesn’t give rise to satisfaction, with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.49:2.1_0: don’t give rise to the defilement, or for those without trouble.
ai-patthana21.49:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.49:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.49:3.1_0: Neither Producing nor spelling, Nor for three reasons,
ai-patthana21.49:3.1_1: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.49:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.49:4.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the defilement, or indication, nor is for the sake of grasping, nor for the sake of repulsion, not for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.49:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.49:5.1_0: Still in a associated with pollutants are not found in a question,
